long_description: Find comfort in the Sunday Afternoons Expedition hat and give yourself a shady oasis no matter where your adventures take you. Convertible crown technology provides superior ventilation while maintaining sun protection. Combined with its full brim, the Expedition Hat allows you to travel comfortably in regions of varying heat and exposure. UPF 50+ sun protection. Nylon fabric is water-repellent and stain-resistant; polyester mesh panels allow airflow. Integrated wicking sweatband liner moves moisture off your brow. Includes a chinstrap with a cord lock to secure the hat around your neck. Rear adjustable cord lock sizing ensures a good fit. The Sunday Afternoons Expedition Hat packs flat for travel.
short_description: Find comfort in the Sunday Afternoons Expedition hat and give yourself a shady oasis no matter where your adventures take you.
